name: My Own Pet
description: "My Own Pet" is a game in which you will find an animal that will need you care for him and help to grow.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 970 or similar DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
